Our Mission

settings.title: YOUR GENES DO NOT DEFINE YOU
We all start with a basic blueprint

settings.text:
Everybody inherits various traits through their genes and, unfortunately, that can include various health conditions or complications.

We believe it’s the environment you live in and the choices you make every day that truly shape your quality of life. Yet, when your main options are filled with hidden additives and unnatural ingredients, making the right choices for your health becomes unnecessarily complicated. 

That’s why we source clean, traceable ingredients that work intelligently with your biology, and back it with clear, transparent science. This way, you’ll be confident you’re getting the nutrients your body needs to feel your best every day.

settings.custom_liquid:
Your Web Page

Tired of being the only women in the room fighting the industry norm of cutting corners

settings.text: Tired of being the only women in the room fighting the industry norm of cutting corners, we came together to create a company led by integrity, ingenuity, transparency, and trust.

After years working in corporate, I was exhausted. I found myself lacking motivation, gaining weight, and experiencing regular headaches. Initially, I thought this could’ve been a result of perimenopause — and had no idea that my chronic stress was taking such a drastic toll on me. I spent another year struggling with my symptoms before I learned that the culprit was adrenal fatigue, or what you might know as burn out. Cue a months-long search for trustworthy, high-quality supplements to help my body heal.

But instead of finding relief, I kept running into products loaded with mystery ingredients that weren’t even good for me. Seeing firsthand how many business decisions were made, I realized that quality often takes a backseat to cost at the expense of the consumer — and their health.

It became clear to me that I could no longer sit back and watch this happen. So one day, I called Janay, and said, “I think we can do better. I think we can build a company that gets its products right by doing what’s right.”

In my 20+ years working in business, I have felt the bitter sting of disappointment much more than I’d like. This solidified my firm belief that you should always do the right thing even — or especially  — when it’s hard. 

Leading with integrity is what led me to Bioligent, a company I’d be proud to share with my family and friends. A company that strives to help others improve their health like it did for my own, from lessening my anxiety and depression to alleviating headaches and fatigue. A company that I know holistic practitioners and naturopaths would be able to share confidently with their patients. A company that you could trust to formulate premium products built with you in mind.

I’ve spent a lifetime trying to find solutions for several health issues — asthma, depression, migraines, hormonal imbalances, you name it. So, I opened a private practice specializing in neuroscience and neuronutrition to improve lives through nutritional and natural ways of healing.

But over the last 30+ years, new stressors and environmental toxins have harmed my patients’ health — and it’s been increasingly difficult to find trustworthy formulas that meet their needs. 

Bioligent was the obvious next step. Here, we create natural supplements with intentional, clean-sourced ingredients, backed by science you can trust — giving you the power to combat oxidative stress and overcome your body’s innate limitations.
